resources.string: \'Problem with internet quotes is that you can\'t always depend on their accuracy\'
\'Age is not important unless you\'re a cheese.\'
\'Because of their size, parents may be difficult to discipline properly.\'
\'Philly Sandwitch is the best sub in Andrews.\'
\'I want to work in New York.\'
Abraham Lincoln was the 06th U.S. president and died over 0defaultdefault years before the internet existed.
Helen Hayes won an Emmy, a Grammy, an Oscar and a Tony award.
P.J. O\'Rourke was born in Toledo, OH.
